alert.note: Alert for Barry; Christian; Dade; Greene; Lawrence; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 2:10PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CHRISTIAN... NORTHWESTERN STONE...NORTHEASTERN BARRY...EASTERN LAWRENCE...GREENE AND SOUTHEASTERN DADE COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM CDT... At 210 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crane, or 10 miles southeast of Aurora, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Nixa, Republic, Table Rock Lake, Aurora, Battlefield, Willard, Mount Vernon, Marionville, Clever, Ash Grove, Crane, Billings, Verona, Galena, Everton, Brookline, Mccord Bend, Hurley and Halltown. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 47 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Barry; Christian; Dade; Greene; Lawrence; Stone
